function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Reliance on likert scale responses may oversimplify participants’ views and experiences.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of questionnaires and interviews as research tools can increase the risk of disease transmission in the data collection process","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stratified random sampling approach may not fully represent the diversity of the population, leading to biased results.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Small sample size of 30 may not capture the full variability of the population, leading to limited generalizability of the findings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of online survey questionnaire and video conferencing for data collection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sampling technique for population selection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of quantitative research design for data collection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mixing of large numbers of individuals for data collection quantitative research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Face-to-face interviews with project managers, contractors, and site engineers qualitative research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of study on the impact of pandemic on construction industry","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Effect on gdp and economic stability","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases in the construction industry","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Storage of treatment-related information during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enormous energy consumption of blockchain technology","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Scalability limitations of blockchain technology","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Complexity and network size requirements of blockchain technology","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privacy preservation challenges of blockchain technology","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Blockchain technology may not be effectively integrated with other technologies like ai and big data, leading to inefficiencies in pandemic control.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate customization of ledgers for local servers in outbreak areas may limit the effectiveness of blockchain technology in optimizing pandemic response.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of integration of blockchain technology with ethical data standards may compromise user privacy protection and lead to ethical concerns.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in secure tracking of learning process and verifying student credentials leading to potential data security threats","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact on world economy and businesses due to lockdowns and social distancing, with the challenge of time-consuming paper-based loan processes","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Necessity for continuous and automated surveillance to monitor covid-19 symptoms and transmission rates","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Patient data privacy violation through unsecured data sharing","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Data forging and mutation in medical iot devices","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unavailability of secure and reliable data sharing in education sector","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Loss of data security and privacy in centralized cloud storage for contact tracing data.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in maintaining a new working environment with social distancing and minimal physical contact.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disruption in the global supply chain for medical equipment and pharmaceuticals.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of secure health record database","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inefficient healthcare management system","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of inaccurate data on social platforms causing panic and fear.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unsafe and unsecure movement of healthcare instruments during the pandemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective monitoring of quarantine cases and slow drug supply.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Using blockchain technology for tracking covid-19 infections among humans","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Supply chain transparency using blockchain technology","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of data accuracy and integrity in disease surveillance","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential risk of vaccine information modification","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of traceability and verification in donation process","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Combining blockchain technology with ai and gis for public surveillance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Slowdown of the global economy due to shutdown of various sectors","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Tracking sensitive medical data on a public blockchain","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on blockchain for public surveillance","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential security breaches in blockchain technology leading to unauthorized access to patient data.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate or incomplete data collection from blockchain participating nodes.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Blockchain technology deployment challenges and integration complexities within healthcare systems.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate and untrustworthy data from existing technologies may lead to incorrect information about the spread of the coronavirus.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misuse or mismanagement of blockchain technology may lead to security breaches or data manipulation, compromising the integrity of the data.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on multiple technologies such as biosensors, 3d scanning, and multi-agent systems may introduce compatibility issues and data integration challenges.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of critical reflections on the importance of cities and how they are governed","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
